com.ibm.portal.model.controller
Interface PortletModelControllerHome

public interface PortletModelControllerHome

An interface for a provider of portlet model controllers. See the following sample on how to obtain a content model controller:

PortletModelController result = null;
final Context ctx = new InitialContext();
final PortletModelControllerHome home = (PortelModelControllerHome) ctx.lookup(PortletModelControllerHome.PORTLET_MODEL_CONTROLLER_JNDI_NAME);
if (home != null) {
result = home.getPortletModelControllerProvider().createPortletModelController(aPortelModel, aUser);
}

Since:
6.1.0
